name: MMA Fighter Nicknames Quiz | Sports Other | 10 Questions

questions.text: The sport of mixed martial arts has some of the best athletes in the world. One of these famous fighters is the controversial loud mouth Tito Ortiz. What is his well known nickname?
questions.explanation:
The Huntington Beach Bad Boy.

	Tito is from Huntington Beach, California, and is known for being a bad boy. His name suits him perfectly.

questions.text: Former Pride FC superstar and former UFC champion Quinton Jackson is better known by what nickname?
questions.explanation:
Rampage.

	He is known by his name Rampage so much that people often forget to call him Quinton, and just call him Rampage Jackson. He has a big tattoo on his arm saying 'Rampage'.

questions.text: One of the most famous and most loved fighters in the world is the Brazilian Wanderlai Silva. Wanderlai is a former Pride FC middleweight champion and is a UFC veteran. What scary nickname is Wanderlai known by?
questions.explanation:
The Axe Murderer.

	Known as the Axe Murderer for his aggressive style of fighting and because of his days of fighting Vale Tudo in Brazil. Vale Tudo is a form of fighting where there are no rules. If you have seen this man fight you will realize his nickname is perfect for him.

questions.text: Hawaiian fighter B.J. Penn is widely considered as the best lightweight fighter in the world.  B.J. Penn had been a UFC fighter for many years and has always been known by the same nickname. What is it?
questions.explanation:
The Prodigy.

	B.J. Penn was known first as a great Jui-Jitsu fighter but quickly developed great striking skills. B.J Penn has such good all round fighting skills he is considered by many the perfect fighter.

questions.text: Former UFC heavyweight champion and team punishment member Ricco Rodriguez is known by what nickname?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Suave

	Ricco got his nickname because of his pretty boy looks and his fear of getting hit in the face.

questions.text: Reality TV show The Ultimate Fighter has produced some great UFC fighters. In season one, what were the nicknames of the two fighters Nate Quarry and Chris Leben, who trained out of the famous training camp, Team Quest?
questions.explanation:
The Rock & The Crippler.

	Chris Leben and Nate Quarry trained in the famous training camp from Portland known as Team Quest. Team Quest's most famous fighter is Randy Couture, who was the team coach on the first season of The Ultimate Fighter. Randy picked both Nate Quarry and Chris Leben to be on his team for the show.

questions.text: Jeff Monson is a great heavyweight fighter who is known as one of the best submission wrestlers in the sport. Monson has fought in main events in Pride FC and the UFC, but what is his unique nickname?
questions.explanation:
The Snowman.

	Jeff Monson was at UFC 65 (Bad Intentions) on November 18, 2006, and fought for the heavyweight championship. Monson ended losing by judges decision to Tim Sylvia but put up a great fight. This was Jeff Monson's last UFC fight.

questions.text: Season three winner of The Ultimate Fighter Michael Bisping is Britain's most successful mixed martial artist.  What nickname did he go by?
questions.explanation:
The Count.

	He got his nickname because he was accused many times of looking like Dracula.

questions.text: What nickname is top British fighter, television presenter, and stand up comedian Ian Freeman known by?
questions.explanation:
The Machine.

	Ian Freeman's biggest win came beating Frank Mir at UFC 38 in London, England.

questions.text: UFC legend and one of the greatest UFC Welterweight Champion ever, Matt Hughes was given what nickname that he became well known by?
questions.explanation:
He never wanted a nickname.

	Matt Hughes is known as very serious fighter who never got carried away with the fame and hype, and so never bothered with a nickname.
